item.title: How to make emotes for skillcapes?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Hey, Just thought I’d tell you that I saw your post and I know how to do it, But I do not currently know where to get it. I’m new to clientside editing, I appoligize for any errors that I make.

Basically, your client does not already have skillcapes emotes yet, and it will not be able to have them unless you put them in there. What you must do for this is add the models for the skillcape emotes themselves. I appoligize again, I do not have the skillcape emotes models. I again, am new to clientside coding, so I will get a tutorial on adding models for you briefly.

Thanks,
And Good luck,
Mod Whip (AKA Legendz)
Owner of Legendz Pk

Read full topic
